title: Highest Cereal Yield
description: In 2022, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines achieved a cereal yield of 31,620.7 kg per hectare, one of the highest in the world.

title: Lowest Short-term Debt
description: As of 2023, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines had one of the lowest short-term debt levels, accounting for only 0.0001% of its total external debt.

title: Clean Air Quality
description: In 2015, only a negligible percentage of the population in Saint Vincent and the Grenadines was exposed to PM2.5 pollution levels exceeding WHO Interim Target-2 values.

title: Low Methane Emissions from Transport
description: In 2023, methane emissions from transport in Saint Vincent and the Grenadines were extremely low, at just 0.0001 Mt CO2e.

title: Low Suicide Rate
description: In 2021, the suicide mortality rate in Saint Vincent and the Grenadines was one of the lowest globally, at 0.41 per 100,000 population.
